    • Using pochi with Seurat

Seurat FeaturePlot enhancement

FeaturePlotPlus.Rd

Seurat FeaturePlot enhancement

Usage

FeaturePlotPlus(
  object,
  feature,
  min.value = 0,
  assay = "RNA",
  viridis_choice = "D",
  ...
)

Arguments

object

Seurat object

feature

Which feature to plot (singular)

min.value

Which threshold value to set as not-expressed/grey in the FeaturePlot

assay

Which assay the feature is located in

viridis_choice

Which viridis palette to choose

...

Other arguments to Seurat::FeaturePlot

Value

Returns a FeaturePlot

Details

Identical to FeaturePlot with the exception that 0-values are set to grey, which replicates the Monocle-type UMAP plots.
